title: CNBC Daily Open: Investors still aren’t convinced by bitcoin
description: Bitcoin is up around 55% this year, but is still roughly 62% down from its all-time high.

title: Chinese electric carmakers ramp up push overseas, setting up clash with U.S., European auto giants
description: Chinese companies from BYD to Leapmotor launched electric vehicles for international markets while Xpeng announced plans to expand into Germany.

title: Mercedes and BMW want to take on Tesla. Check out their new electric concept cars
description: At the IAA auto show in Munich, Mercedes showed off the Mercedes-Benz Concept CLA Class while BMW revealed the BMW Vision Neue Klasse.

title: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight loss drug launches in the UK
description: Novo Nordisk launched its Wegovy weight loss injection in the U.K. Monday, furthering the drug's rollout in Europe despite ongoing supply constraints.

title: 'We are ready to engage': Europe's biggest carmakers brace for China's EV challenge
description: Europe's biggest car manufacturers are wary of the competitive threat posed by new Chinese companies, as the industry moves towards electrification.

title: 'Very stupid': Italy's bank tax remains controversial as government scrambles to update it
description: Italy's shock tax on banks continues to prove controversial, even as the government insists it can "improve" it.

title: Germany is the 'sick man of Europe' — and it's causing a shift to the right, top economist says
description: Germany is once again the sick man of Europe, economist Hans-Werner Sinn told CNBC, and he said the shift could cause a rise in right-wing politics.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Why did the unemployment rate and jobs rise in tandem?
description: The U.S. economy added more jobs in July, but the overall unemployment rate rose. This may sound counterintuitive, but there’s a simple explanation.

title: Oil giant led by COP28 boss to spend an ‘eyewatering’ $1 billion a month on fossil fuels this decade, research says
description: The research comes ahead of the COP28 climate summit, with Dubai set to host the U.N.'s annual conference from Nov. 30 through to Dec. 12.

title: Hong Kong property stocks surge as China takes action to revive property sector
description: Stocks were also helped by Country Garden Holdings reportedly winning approval to extend repayment on an onshore private bond to 2026.

title: Li Auto reports record deliveries for August; Chinese EV brands on track to hit third-quarter guidance
description: Chinese electric car companies Nio, Xpeng and Li Auto delivered enough vehicles in August to keep pace with their third-quarter guidance.

title: BMW, Mercedes launch biggest EV push yet to catch Tesla with new models
description: At the IAA Mobility motor show in Munich, Germany, BMW and Mercedes revealed electric concept cars and new platforms for their future battery-powered vehicles.
